participant_1.background:
I try to live my life as normal as possible, but I have to be more careful now that I'm carrying twins.
I play the guitar to accompany my singing.
I love getting my favorite coffee from Starbucks after a long day at the lab.
i watch jimmy fallon s show every night.
I have no use for a crib, but I would love to have a music studio in my dorm room.

participant_2.background:
I am a woman who worries about the judgment of my family because of my sexual orientation.
I'm prone to tripping over my own two feet and dropping things.
I was a hockey player in my youth, but now I enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.
It's a bit chilly, but I'm looking forward to taking my dog hiking later.
I'd be scared to tell my family, but I think they'd be accepting.

content.text: Not too bad, a little chilly today but I'm looking forward to taking my dog hiking later. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm carrying twins and just trying to live my life as normal as possible.
Oh wow, congratulations! That's amazing. I can't imagine how much work that must be but I'm sure it's worth it.
Thanks! It is a lot of work, but it's also really exciting. I'm just trying to stay as healthy as possible and take care of myself.

That's good to hear. I'm sure you'll be great parents. I have a dog that I love to take hiking with me. I'm not sure if you're into that, but it's a great way to get some exercise and spend time with your pet.
That sounds fun. I've never been hiking before, but I'd love to try it. Maybe I'll bring my guitar along and play some music while we're out there.
That would be great! I love listening to music while I'm hiking. It really makes the experience more enjoyable.
Me too. I love listening to Jimmy Fallon's show every night. He always makes me laugh.
I love Jimmy Fallon too! He's so funny and entertaining. I always watch his show when I can.
He's the best! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too. I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun hiking together.
I'm sure we will too. Thanks for chatting with me. I'm feeling much better about going hiking now.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Have a great day!
